app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1422-0067/22/4/1566/s1, Table S1: Overview on mice behavioral deficits in Prnp −/− mice during aging (adapted from Schmitz et al., 2014a). Figure S1A,B. Western blot and densitometric analysis of MCT1 and PrP c expression in the cortex of 3-month-old WT and Prnp −/− mice. MCT1 expression was not significantly changed in 3-month-old WT as compared to Prnp −/− mice.
